role.name: DevOps
role.description: Managed NovoNordisk Corporation tenants with more than 100 websites. Responsible for production deployment, resolved customer requests and incidents, managed user permission, and worked with the cloud. Technologies: Adobe Experience Management (AEM), Adobe Analysis, Jenkins, Azure.
